CHARGING CHARGING

CHARGING CHARGING

CHARGING CHARGING

PLUG IN, CHARGE AND GO

With plenty of range for both daily drives and road trips, Tesla vehicles get

you where you want to go. Charging is fast, convenient and available

anywhere with electricity.

CHARGING

STATION

FINDER

Our Tesla automatically finds the best routes and suggests charging stations along the way

Optimize route

Finds the best route to avoid traffic and charge if needed.

Measures battery

Gives real-time battery estimates based on your driving style.

Recommends chargers

Offers charging location recommendations along your route.

Help Me Charge

Find the charging solution that meets your needs by

answering questions about your home, driving habits and

lifestyle.
